text: Hello there, I just want to set the HS cookie when the visitor submits the HS form without accepting the cookie banner. Since we are notifying the visitor that the privacy policy will be accepting while submitting the form. For other's, the flow will be same as default. Could someone please help me?

Hello team!
Can anyone tell me if using a private app token to make hundreds of HS API requests (within the rate limit) interfere with the performance or enrollment process of our workflows, especially if the same token is also used by an external API integrated with these workflows?

Thank you in advance

Hello everyone, I have noticed that the schema purge route no longer exists. Now I have a schema that I cannot find in the portal via the API, it is archived and I can neither restore the schema nor delete it completely, who can help me with this?

Hello, can anyone help me, When I make the API call to GET all engagements, I’m getting data from 2019-2022 and not the recent meetings that have been booked any idea why?
Also we have multiple meeting plans but the API call is not returning data from the default plan

are you sure it's not just giving you the first page of many pages or results?

You could specify some filters in the request, or request them in specific order... or you could probably retrieve them all but look in the results for a link to request the next page of results

Hi everyone.
Can anyone explain to me, is <https://developers.HubSpot.com/beta-docs/reference/api/crm/objects/contacts#post-%2Fcrm%2Fv3%2Fobjects%2Fcontacts%2Fbatch%2Fupsert|crm/v3/objects/contacts/batch/upsert> the sync method, or async?

Because i don't really understand `"status": "PENDING"`  from response in example.
If it is sync, then what does this `status`  means?

And if not, then, can this (contact creation/update) operation fail if i get 200 in response?
Hello Team!  I am looking to fetch Call Transcript via HubSpot API. Can someone please guide me
I have used this document but its not giving me Call Transcript

Hi! I need to create an *auto-reply WhatsApp message for unknown contacts* who start a conversation after business hours.

Since HubSpot does not offer an auto-reply feature, I am considering creating a workflow based on conversations. I plan to use custom code to retrieve the WhatsApp contact phone number of the sender, create a new contact, associate it with the conversation, and send a WhatsApp template based on our office hours criteria.

I noticed that the endpoint `/conversations/v3/conversations/threads/{threadId}` returns an `associatedContactId`. However, I encountered an issue when trying to get information about the associated contact by using `/crm/v4/objects/conversations/$threadId/associations/0-1/$associatedContactId`; it returned a "405 Method Not Allowed" error.

Is there a way to automatically generate contacts from WhatsApp conversations? Or is there another method to set up an auto-reply for WhatsApp messages from unknown contacts?
